sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import "../CSS/infobar.css"; import "../App.css"; interface infoBarprop { genClass: String; name: String; steps: [String]; remind: Date | null; dueDate: Date | null; repeat: { freq: String; on: [String] } | null; note: String; createdOn: Date; important: Boolean; } export function Infobar({ genClass, name, steps, remind, dueDate, repeat, note, createdOn, important, }: infoBarprop) { const crossimg = require("../Images/rightSidebar-cross.png"); const starON = require("../Images/task-star-On.png"); const starOff = require("../Images/task-star.png"); const myDaySun = require("../Images/infobar-myDaySun.png"); const alarmimg = require("../Images/rightSidebar-alarm.png"); const latertodayimg = require("../Images/infobar-latertoday.png"); const tomorowimg = require("../Images/infobar-tomorow.png"); const nextweekimg = require("../Images/infobar-nextweek.png"); const calenderimg = require("../Images/rightsidebar-calender.png"); const repeatimg = require("../Images/task-repeat.png"); const deleteimg = require("../Images/infobar-delete.png"); const days = ["Sun", "Mon", "Tue", "Wed", "Thu", "Fri", "Sat"]; const months = [ "Jan", "Feb", "Mar", "Apr", "May", "Jun", "Jul", "Aug", "Sep", "Nov", "Dec", ]; const today = new Date(); return (
{name}
Add to My Day
Remind me {remind ? `at ${remind.getHours()}:00` : ""}
{remind ? `${days[remind.getDay()]}, ${remind.getDate()} ${ months[remind.getMonth()] } ` : ""}
Later Today
{`${days[today.getDay()]}, 22:00`}
Tomorow
{`${ days[today.getDay() + 1] }, ${today.getHours()}:00`}
Next Week
Sun, 9:00
Pick a date and time
{dueDate ? `${days[dueDate.getDay()]}, ${dueDate.getDate()} ${ months[dueDate.getMonth()] }` : "Add a due date"}
Today
{`${days[today.getDay()]}, 22:00`}
Tomorow
{`${days[today.getDay() + 1]}, 22:00`}
Next Week
Sun, 9:00
Pick a date and time
{repeat ? `${repeat.freq}` : "repeat"}
{repeat ? `${repeat.on.join(" ")}` : ""}
Daily
Weekdays
Weekly
Monthly
Yearly
Custom
Created on 18 may
); }
